You can control home ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $39.99 - $14.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:16:01 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Control from anywhere

Remote control your household appliances form anywhere in the world on your smart phone or tablet over the internet connection (WiFi/3G/4G) using the smart plug.

1-Control from Anywhere

2-Compact Design

3- Google home to manage your home devices through voice control. You can control home appliances remotely and smartly by your phone using the App.Voice Control

4-Device Grouping

5-No Hub Required

6-Set Schedules

You can control your appliances wherever you are and anytime, no hub required. Works with Cloud Intelligence App Works with Alexa and Google Assistant Timer function Schedule feature Only supports 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi network first connection Energy Saving

How to Use Amysen Smart Plug

Connect Smart Outlet Amysen Only Cloud Intelligence App .

-Search and download *Cloud Intelligence* on App Store or Google Play.

-Set up your *Cloud Intelligence* account by E-mail or phone number.

-Connect the plug to your local Wi-Fi (Only 2.4GHz).

-Wait seconds, till process 100% then Successes.

-More details are available in User Manual and Application Guide.

The smart plug works with Amazon Alexa, echo dot and Google home to manage your home devices through voice control. You can control home appliances remotely and smartly by using Cloud Intelligence With the convenient timer function, the smart plug can protect the devices safety, prevent from overcharging and overheating, and reduce energy use. Switch your home appliances On/Off automatically and intelligently by setting a specific time with the smart plug

Smart Plug Amysen

Amysen Mini Smart Plug

Amysen smart plug adopts premium materials, such as fire-resistant shell, phosphor bronze connects and advanced PCBA, can provide fire Prevention, over load protection to protect you and your family.

Functions of Amysen smart plug

Works with AlexaWorks with Google AssistantSchedule featureTimer functionCreate GroupCountdown functionShare to Families​ Note :

1. The maximum power changed as local voltage.2. Support smart phone IOS 8.0 above, Adroid 4.4 above.3. The smart plug can only support 2.4G network when connecting.

What’s in Box: Amysen Mini Socket 4PACK , User Manual Technical SpecificWorking Temp: -10 ~ 60 ℃ >Wi-Fi Requirement: 2.4Ghz Onlyations Technical SpecificWorking Temp: -10 ~ 60 ℃ >Wi-Fi Requirement: 2.4Ghz Onlyations Rated Current: 10A Max AC Frequency: 2.4 Ghz Max power: 1200W

Timer Schedule

Every single time-set those up on a schedule serve you according to your daily routine and preferences. Turn off the light after you go on the bed, or get a coffee even before you’re out of bed.

Away Mode

Improve your home security by turning appliances like lamps on and off at random intervals to make it look like you’re home even when you’re not.

Voice Control

Use simple voice commands with your smart plug and any Alexa, Google Assistant or Microsoft Cortana. Turn off your lamp without ever leaving your bed or touching your phone.

Wireless Control from Anywhere

With Amysen smart plug, you can create scene modes, scheduling your home devices on/off at sunrise/sunset automatically before you leave home or back home. Add your fan to Scene Schedule List,It can be turned on automatically when the temperature is high even though you’re sleeping. Running your house smarter and effectively.

Voice Control with Voice Assistants

When Alexa and Google Home sync with Cloud Intelligence App, Amysen smart plug gives hands-free voice control with Amazon Alexa and Google Home to turn on/off your lamps, appliances or your devices group all over your home. Just using your voice to command and you will get what you want: ”Alexa, turn on the lights.” “Okay.”

Timer Schedule and Countdown on App

Cloud Intelligence App compatible with iOS and Android smart phone. Sets multiple Timer Schedules and Countdown on App to turn on/off your fan, coffee maker, lamps at your pre-set time, say goodbye to multi-time click switch by hands. lets you do amazing things with your computer and phone.

Scene Modes with Smart Home

With Amysen smart plug, you can create scene modes, scheduling your home devices on/off at sunrise/sunset automatically before you leave home or back home. Add your fan to Scene Schedule List,It can be turned on automatically when the temperature is high even though you’re sleeping. Running your house smarter and effectively.

Control
Voice & APP Remote Control Voice & APP Remote Control Voice & APP Remote Control Voice & APP Remote Control Voice & APP Remote Control Voice & APP Remote Control

Power Supply
AC100V-250V AC100V-250V AC100V-240V AC100V-250V AC100V-240V AC100V-250V

Light
Control home appliances remotely and smartly by your phone or tablet using the smart life App RGB + Warm White Light LED Indicator Light RGB + Warm White Light LED Indicator Light RGB + Warm White Light

Material
Vo Fire-resistant PC – Aerometal + ABS Vo Fire-resistant PC – Aerometal + ABS Vo Fire-resistant PC – Aerometal + ABS Vo Fire-resistant PC – Aerometal + ABS Vo Fire-resistant PC – Aerometal + ABS Vo Fire-resistant PC – Aerometal + ABS

Feature
Control home appliances remotely and smartly by your phone or tablet using the smart life App Led lights for room Energy saving : 9W 810ml Led light bulb with 30000 hrs lifespan, smart bulb is equivalent to 75W saving up to 85% energy Control home appliances remotely and smartly by your phone or tablet using the smart life App. Led Light bulbs Multicolor : Color temperature range 2700- 6000K + RGB saving up to 85% energy Smart bulb is equivalent to 75W incandescent bulbs, saving up to 85% energy saving up to 85% energy Control home appliances remotely and smartly by your phone or tablet using the smart life App.

Only 2.4GHz WiFi

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 0.39 x 0.39 x 0.39 inches; 8.78 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 24, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Amysen
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09X4BXBD6
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

Smart remote control: the smart plug works with amazon alexa and google home which helps to manage your home devices through voice control. You can control home appliances remotely and smartly by your phone or tablet when you use Only Cloud Intelligence App.
Timer function: switch your home appliances on/off automatically and intelligently by setting a specific time with the smart plug. You can make a schedule for the air conditioner and pre-set your house lit before coming home.
Easy to install and use: this smart plug connects with internet through wi-fi network(only 2.4Ghz). no hub and subscription required, just plug it into an outlet, and connect a device to the smart plug, then wirelessly control home appliances whenever and wherever.
Energy saving and safe: with the convenient timer function, the smart plug can protect the devices safely and prevent your appliances from overcharging and overheating, and reducing energy use.
Wide application: the smart socket can be used for any home appliances, such as lights, electric ovens, toasters, fans, air-conditioners and coffee mills, etc. Strong signal ensures the connection between the network and sockets.

Read more

Price: $239.99 - $181.69
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:10:08 UTC – Details)


Samsung Galaxy A22 5G mobile was launched on 2nd June 2021. The phone comes with a 6.60-inch touchscreen display. Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is powered by an octa-core processor. It comes with 4GB of RAM. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs Android 11 and is powered by a 5000mAh battery. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G supports proprietary fast charging. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G on the rear packs a triple camera setup featuring a 48-megapixel primary camera with an f/1.8 aperture; a 5-megapixel camera with an f/2.2 aperture; a 2-megapixel camera, and a 2-megapixel camera with an f/2.4 aperture. The rear camera setup has autofocus. It has a single front camera setup for selfies, featuring an 8-megapixel sensor with an f/2.0 aperture. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G runs One UI Core 3.1 is based on Android 11 and packs 64GB of inbuilt storage (up to 1000GB). The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G is a dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. The Samsung Galaxy A22 5G measures 167.20 x 76.40 x 9.00mm (height x width x thickness) and weighs 203.00 grams. It was launched in Grey, Mint, and Violet color. Connectivity options on the Samsung Galaxy A22 5G include Wi-Fi, GPS, USB Type-C, 3G, and 4G (with support for Band 40 used by some LTE networks in India). Sensors on the phone include accelerometer, ambient light sensor, proximity sensor, and fingerprint sensor.
128GB ROM, 4GB RAM, Expandable MicroSD, MediaTek MT6833 Dimensity 700 5G (7 nm), Octa-core, Mali-G57 MC2
Dual-SIM (GSM) mobile that accepts Nano-SIM mobile. Rear Camera: 48MP, F1.8 + 5MP, F2.2 + 2MP, F2.4 (depth), Front Camera: 8MP, F2.0
2G Bands: 850, 900, 1800, 1900MHz, 3G Bands: 850, 900, 1700, 1900, 4G LTE Bands: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 12, 17, 20, 26, 28, 38, 40, 41 , 66
5G Bands: N1(2100), N3(1800), N5(850), N7(2600), N8(900), N20(800), N28(700), N66(AWS-3) N38(2600), N40(2300), N41(2500), N78(3500). May not get 5G as it is not available in all regions. Please check with your carrier for compatible 5G Bands.
International Model compatible with Most GSM Carriers in US and Global like T-Mobile, AT&T, MetroPCS, etc. Will NOT work with CDMA Carriers Such as Verizon, Sprint.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $28.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:48 UTC – Details)



Voice Control: You can control your devices hands free, just give voice commands to turn on/off the connected devices. Compatible with Apple HomeKit, Apple Watch, Siri, Carplay, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant.
Compact Size: Smart plug occupies only one socket, the device allows you to stack two mini smart plugs in the same outlet, which is convenient and practical.
Schedule: You can schedule connected home devices to turn on and off automatically by smart plugs. Save energy when lights are not needed or left on by accident. Sunrise and sunset setting are supported.
Quality: The mini plug is made of PC flame retardant material, and has been approved for safety and quality assurance. Certified by ETL and FCC, it supports home appliance up to 15A.

Price: $28.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:18:48 UTC – Details)

WiFi protocols supported: IEEE 802.11b/g/n; System requirement: Android 4.1 or higher iOS 9.0 or higher; Wireless type: 2.4GHz 1T1R.
Multicolor with a wide range of colors and dimming capabilities, Kasa smart’s multicolor light bulb offers endless lighting possibilities; You can choose a light for everything from a dinner party to a late night study session
No hub required, the Kasa smart Wi-Fi light bulb, dximmable connects to your home’s secure Wi-Fi network; No need for a hub or extra equipment; All you need is your smartphone, the Kasa smart app and a Wi-Fi connection to start controlling your bulb from anywhere
Control from anywhere: Control your smart light bulb from anywhere with your smartphone using the free Kasa smart app (iOS, Android); Dim, turn on or off or change the colors of your light bulb remotely at your fingertips
Voice control: Use simple voice commands to control your Kasa smart Multicolor light bulb with any Alexa, Google Assistant or Microsoft Cortana; Have your voice assistant change the color to help you wake up in the morning or adjust the brightness to help your kids settle down in the evening
Note: Requires a secured 2.4 GigaHertz Wi Fi network connection

From the brand

Swipe left to learn more ⊳⊳⊳

About Eightree

Eightree is an up-and-coming brand established in 2021, dedicated to product development and manufacturing in the field of smart home.

Our mission is to provide more convenient, high quality but affordable smart home solutions for people around the world.

Smart home never needs to be expensive, just enjoy the convenience that smart home brings to your life. Eightree is always at your service.

Smart Plugs Alexa Compatible

Energy Monitor&Smart Lighting

Item model number ‏ : ‎ ET01
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 30, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ EIGHTREE
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B2PFFDKF

APP Remote Control: Easily control your home appliances at any time and any place through Smart Life APP. No more worrying about forgetting to turn off the appliances when you are out.
Voice Control: Smart plugs that work with Alexa and Google Assitant, you can speak with Alexa and OK Google to achieve hands-free control of home electrical devices.
Easy Setup: It takes less than two minutes for the configurartion. And the upgraded chip makes it easy to keep a stable network connection and not easy to go offline.
Other Features: Diverse timer scheduling functions, Create scenes, Group control, and Device sharing functions are also configured, just choose us to start your smart home tour.
7*24 Customer Service: If you encounter any issues or need further support, please get in touch with us directly via Amazon or email us.

Price: $25.99 - $13.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:40:32 UTC – Details)

Product Description

YOUR CHOICE OF SHADE… Semi-Transparent Sunshades

Semi-transparent sunshades are for areas in which Sun & UV protection are more important than visibility such as baby car seat sun protection for infants, small children, pets, adults with sensitive skin, pilots of aircraft and watercraft, providing the ultimate protection for the whole family.

Transparent Sunshades

Transparent window shades are lighter shades, ideal for the front side window of a vehicle, where visibility is more important. It can also be used on any glass surface from your kitchen window to the school bus.

Quality Matters! 𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁y

Kinder Fluff sun shades are made of 120GSM (versus commonly used 80 GSM), combined with 15s tinted static-protective film (versus commonly used 10s).

𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻

Kinder Fluff Sunshades are made with higher quality connector clamps, preventing breakage/separation of the wires during folding.

𝗖𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗗 (SPF 100)

The Only Certified Window Sunshade in the Market!

Proven to block 99.79% of UVA and 99.95% of UVB!

With the max level of UPF in the category 50+

Trusted Brand

Kinder Fluff takes pride in doing it right! We open up the door & show you what to look for when choosing a high-quality sunshade.

-Because We Care-

(Flip to see more)

Feel The Difference…

This set contains 2 Transparent and 2 semi-transparent sunshades + a storage bag.

Made of 120GSM mesh and 15s film, this certified and award-winning sunshade, blocks more sun and ultraviolet rays, providing better sun protection to the skin.

Overlap to cover larger windows.

(Flip to see more)

𝗖𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗗

The Only Certified Window Sunshade in the Market!

Proven to block 99.79% of UVA and 99.95% of UVB!

With the maximum level of UPF in the category (50+) and maximum protection of 100 SPF.

(Flip to see more)

Overlap to fit

Designed to fit any large window size by simply overlapping. Perfect for car side windows, windshield, rear, back seat as a baby car seat sun protection, at home, in the office, on the boat, airplane, bus, train, farm… Kinder Fluff protects the whole family from sun exposure, including pets & plants.

Please Note: the shades are packed back to back to protect the film from damage & it may appear as 2 pieces rather than 4. Please pull them apart gently and you will have a complete set of 4.

(Flip to see more)

𝗜𝗻 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗰𝗮𝗿, 𝗮𝗶𝗿𝗽𝗹𝗮𝗻𝗲, 𝘀𝗵𝗶𝗽, 𝗯𝘂𝘀, 𝘃𝗮𝗻 𝗼𝗿 𝘁𝗿𝗮𝗶𝗻..

Protect yourself and your loved ones from the heat, glare and the damaging sun throughout the day.

According to EPA, most of an average person’s UV exposure from the sun occurs before the age of 18. Too much UV exposure or frequent sunburns, particularly during childhood, can cause severe or serious damage to the skin.

For peace of mind, go with certified sunshades, choose Kinder Fluff.

(Flip to see more)

𝗙𝗼𝗿 𝗶𝗻𝗱𝗼𝗼𝗿 𝘂𝘀𝗲

Do you have that kitchen window that lets too much sun in, spoiling your cooking activity?

Or an office window that the sun glares to your face when you are trying to see your laptop screen?

Then this sunshade is for you. Perfect sized at 20”x12″, it sticks to any glass surface including the ones inside the house and fits most window size by simply overlapping each other.

(Flip to see more)

𝗔𝗻𝘆𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲, 𝗲𝘃𝗲𝗿𝘆𝘄𝗵𝗲𝗿𝗲…

Kinder Fluff sunshades are designed to fit any large window size by simply overlapping them. Perfect for car windows, windshield, and back seat windows as a baby car sun shade and also any large windows, such as aircraft or watercraft, or the ones inside your house.

If it is good enough for a pilot in high altitude , it is definitely good enough to protect you on the ground.

The only Certified Sunshade & The Winner of Mom’s Choice Gold Award Install and remove in seconds

Due to the static effect created by the film, this sunshade will cling to any glass surface without any suction cup or adhesive. simply put the shade on the window and gently press to stabilize.

Please Note: Dust is the main factor for the loss of static effect. In such a case, simply rinse the shades with cold water, wipe the window clean and it should be as good as new!

𝐆𝐎𝐋𝐃 𝐀𝐖𝐀𝐑𝐃

The Gold Winner of Mom’s Choice Award.

The Mom’s Choice Awards (MCA) evaluates products and services created for children, families and educators. The program is globally recognized for establishing the benchmark of excellence in family-friendly media, products and services.

𝗚𝗢 𝗕𝗘𝗬𝗢𝗡𝗗 𝗔𝗪𝗔𝗥𝗗

Winner of the global acknowledgement of businesses who went above and beyond to make the world a better place!

KinderFluff is dedicated to offering premium quality products and affordable for consumers who seek baby products that are both comfortable and safe, after all, “Because We Care” is our motto.

This is how it works…

Kinder Fluff Sunshades are made with tightly woven fabric structured with fewer “holes or spaces” for the UVR not to sneak through to your skin. The UV absorption is enhanced using black dye. Then the UV absorbers and blockers are added during the manufacturing process which also increase the sun protection ability of the mesh, providing extra sun protection and UVR block for the whole family and your car’s interior.

No suction cups or adhesive and definitely no residue

Due to the Static Effect created by the thick film, these shades “cling” to the window without any suction cups or adhesive. easy on easy off for any glass surface

𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗕𝗿𝗮𝗻𝗱 𝘆𝗼𝘂 𝗧𝗿𝘂𝘀𝘁

Often you won’t get any information about the structure of car window shades in the market. No one will tell you what type of fabric they are made of or what kind of film they use. Simply because they are not top of the line! Kinder Fluff takes pride in doing it right! We open up the door & show you what to look for when looking for a high quality sun shade. We’re the only brand with certified shades proven to block over 99%UVR rays & MCA Gold winner. We have confidence in our quality.

Videos and How To Fold Instructions

(Flip to see more…)

𝗜𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝘀 𝗮𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝘀 𝘄𝗲 𝗰𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗺?

𝗦𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 𝘀𝗮𝘆𝘀 𝗬𝗘𝗦!

Watch the video for UV protection and then flip to watch the video for sun exposure.

-Because we care-

(Flip to see more…)

𝗜𝘀 𝗶𝘁 𝗮𝘀 𝗮𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗮𝘀 𝘄𝗲 𝗰𝗹𝗮𝗶𝗺?

𝑾𝒂𝒕𝒄𝒉 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒗𝒊𝒅𝒆𝒐 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒔𝒆𝒆 𝒇𝒐𝒓 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓𝒔𝒆𝒍𝒇!

.

.

Then flip to learn about the visibility.

(Flip to see more…)

Quality Matters

Made of 120GSM mesh and 15s film, certified and award winner, it blocks more sun and ultraviolet rays, providing better sun protection to the skin.

(Flip to see more…)

Anywhere, Everywhere…

Where sun and UVR protection is needed!

In the car, on the bus, airplane, boat, home or office… it clings in any glass type, even the ones inside of your house or tinted ones.

Please Note: Dust is the main factor for the loss of static effect. In such case, simply rinse the shades with cold water, wipe the window clean and it should be as good as new!

(Flip to see more…)

𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗣𝗿𝗼𝘁𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻

Remove from the pack & separate the shades carefully attached to each other by the cling film side.

How to install: 1.Wipe the window with a damp cloth. 2.Place the Window Shade with the static side on the window. 3.Apply pressure throughout the sun shade until it is firmly pressed to the window.

Note: It’s normal to see wrinkles on the shades when you first receive them. This is the nature of the film & happens during storage but it should open up after a couple of days.

Play & flip to see more

(Flip to see more…)

𝗖𝗼𝗺𝗽𝗮𝗰𝘁 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻

When not in use Twist to Fold into a small circle and fit in the provided storage bag for easy storage inside any handbag, car organiser, sun visor strap or door pocket.

How to fold: 1. Put all the pieces that are to be folded together on top of each other. 2. Hold the shades on both sides. 3. Bring your hands towards each other with a twist. 4. The lightweight wire will fold itself into a small circle. 5. Store in the provided storage pouch.

Play the video for more.

What’s special about this sunshade?

It’s made of 120 GSM mesh (versus commonly used 80 GSM), paired with 15s static-protective film (versus commonly used 10s), offering superior quality & higher density, providing better sun/UV protection. It also comes in 2 transparency options.

How can I install and uninstall this?

Wipe the window clean, throw this bad boy over the glass and give it a gentle swipe. For folding, please see video for visual explanation.

Can I open the window with this sunshade on?

No. The shades attach to the glass so they need to be removed before operating the car window.

Mine arrived with some wrinkles. Is it normal?

Yes. This is due to the nature of the plastic film and happens during storage but it should open up after a couple of days.

What is included in the package?

This set includes 2 transparent shades, 2 semi-transparent shades & a free storage pouch. Please keep in mind they are packed back to back to protect the film from damage during shipping & may appear as 2 pieces rather sets. Pull them apart gently.

The only car window shades CERTIFIED to block 99.79% of UVA & 99.95% of UVB. SPF100 & UPF 50+
This set contains 2 transparent & 2 semi-transparent car window covers to use according to your need
Made of 120 GSM,15S Film & a unique clamp, it’s the most durable automotive interior sun protection
These foldable baby car window shades are designed to fit any windows . Each car shade is 20″x12″
Best as baby shower gift, car accessories for men, women , babies & pet in car,truck,suv,van,bus.


YOUR CHOICE OF SHADE…

Semi-Transparent Sunshades

Semi-transparent sunshades are for areas in which Sun & UV protection are more important than visibility such as baby car seat sun protection for infants, small children, pets, adults with sensitive skin, pilots of aircraft and watercraft, providing the ultimate protection for the whole family.

Transparent Sunshades

Transparent window shades are lighter shades, ideal for the front side window of a vehicle, where visibility is more important. It can also be used on any glass surface from your kitchen window to the school bus.

Quality Matters!

𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗤𝘂𝗮𝗹𝗶𝘁y

Kinder Fluff sun shades are made of 120GSM (versus commonly used 80 GSM), combined with 15s tinted static-protective film (versus commonly used 10s).

𝗦𝘂𝗽𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗼𝗿 𝗗𝗲𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗻

Kinder Fluff Sunshades are made with higher quality connector clamps, preventing breakage/separation of the wires during folding.

This 20V MAX* Cordless Leaf Blower is ideal for clearing debris from the ground and overhead. A 3-speed design offers versatility for a range of jobs, while its compact profile makes it perfect for use in tight spots. This battery powered leaf blower is part of the 20V MAX* System of products.
Tool only, Battery sold separately.Applications : Tuck pointing cleaning joints, Clearing debris from the ground or overhead, Clearing work areaIncludes : (3) Nozzle attachments
3-speed variable speed switch of the cordless blower provides control and versatility
Variable speed trigger allows adjustment of blowing power during use
Trigger lock-on reduces end user fatigue
Lightweight compact design allows use in space restricted areas. Battery sold separately

From the brand

At Meross, we create products that empower people’s lives. We believe in making homes smarter and people’s lives easier. We believe everyone deserves a smart life, and it should be simple, smart, and stable.

Smart Plugs Support Homekit

Outdoor Plugs Support Homekit

Smart Power Strip & Smart Plug

Smart Bulbs

Smart LED Strip Lights

Remote Control: To enable HomeKit remote control, you need a HomePod, an Apple TV 4K, Apple TV HD, or an iPad. Set any of these Apple devices in your house as a HomeKit bridge and connect it to your home 2.4GHz Wi-Fi network. Keep in mind that once your HomeKit bridge is set up, it has to be kept online. If it is powered off or disconnected from the Wi-Fi, it will fail to respond when you intend to control the device remotely.
Voice Control: You can control your devices hands free, just give voice commands to turn on/off the connected devices. Compatible with Apple HomeKit, Apple Watch, Siri, Carplay, Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant.
Compact Size: Smart plug occupies only one socket, the device allows you to stack two mini smart plugs in the same outlet, which is convenient and practical.
Schedule: You can schedule connected devices to turn on and off automatically by smart plugs. Save energy when lights are not needed or left on by accident. Sunrise and sunset setting are supported.
Quality: Smart outlet is made of PC flame retardant material, and has been approved for safety and quality assurance. Certified by ETL and FCC, it supports home appliance up to 15A.

From the brand

About HBN: A direct distributor of premium quality home improvement products. We strive to provide better products and after-sales service to help every customer’s life easier and more convenient.

Our Products: indoor & outdoor smart plug, remote outlet, mini fridge and string lights.

Outdoor remote outlet

Heavy Duty 3-Prong Outlet

Indoor smart plug

outlet timer

CONTROL FROM ANYWHERE – Turn lights, fans, and appliances on or off automatically from anywhere in the world with your smartphone anytime via the HBN Smart app.
DUAL PLUG & INDEPENDENT CONTROL – HBN smart plugs with two grounded outlets (up to 15A, 1875w) feature space-saving for users, which can control all electrical appliances individually or together.
VOICE CONTROL – Simply voice command to control multiple home devices with our smart outlet via Alexa or Google Home. Enjoy the hands-free convenience of controlling any home electronic appliances. Made for everyone, Perfect for elderly, disabled or if the plug is hard-to-reach.
TIMER AND SCHEDULE SETTING- Use timer or countdown schedules to automatically turn on and off any home electronics and appliances such as lamps, fans, humidifier, Christmas lights etc. For example, setting lights to come on at dusk or turning off at sunrise to reduce energy consumption and save money.
EASY TO INSTALL & WARRANTY – Download the HBN Smart App and follow the instructions to connect the smart plugs. No Hub Required, works with 2.4GHz network. ETL certified for safety use. 15 months warranty.
